title: Is stopping a girl and asking her 'From 1-10, what do you rate me?' a good pick-up technique? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think most pickup techniques are bullshit. Moreover, people are wise to them, such as this one about lowering their barriers to them giving you their phone number.Just be yourself, try to make some genuine conversation, see if it goes anywhere. Don't pester people and stop once you figure they're not interested.Maybe it will work and maybe it won't. It's okay. There are no mystical PUA secrets.

No.  This "technique" just screams "not worth my time." Here are the reasons 7 steps? Seriously? You're asking her to quantify your attractiveness. You're wasting a lot of time and requiring a lot of resources. Do you have a pen on you?That's a seriously dead end question. Where is the conversation going to go? Are you going to haggle?

This is one of those disingenuous questions that I can't see working. There is no right answer. Whatever she writes has the chance for her to be accosted. If she writes a high number, you're not going to leave her alone. If she puts a low number, she could suffer abuse, possible physical assault.

You asking a girl to qualify You. That  is a no-no If you have to qualify yourself for a girl you losing any hope of romantic interest. And if a girl starts qualifying herself for you  - that is indicator of interest
